description:
My place is close to Subway, Times Square, Broadway Theatre, Central Park. You’ll love my place because of it is close to midtown, and still a quiet area. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).

2 bedroom apartment in the upper east side. Close to the subway (4,5,6 and F). 20 Minutes from Tims Square and Broadway, 10 minutes walk to Central Park.

The apartment is fully furnished and equipped. We have 2 little girls, so the place is ready for a family. You can use the washing and drying machines.
name: Family-friendly Uppereast apartment
